name: @tiny-router/pattern-parser
description: The path pattern parser and RegExp compiler, that supports named variables, variable constraints, bash-like alternation, regular expressions, and wildcards.

scripts.build: tsc --project ./tsconfig.build.json && npm run rollup && npm run terser
scripts.terser: for file in $(find ./lib -name '*.js'); do terser --compress --mangle --mangle-props reserved=[__esModule],regex=/^_/ --output $file -- $file; done || exit 1

author: Savva Mikhalevski <smikhalevski@gmail.com>
